title: [Sea of Fire, Sanctum Gates]
description: Black ora gates and high walls of sandstone erupt from the untamed desert, heralding a high spire with a wide compound at its base.  An immense serpent of bronze and copper clings to the tower, climbing up toward a windowed dome at its zenith.  Sunlight reflects off of windows of stained glass, and its heat awakens a faint odor of decay from the entire place.
